sentences.en: All that he did caused her much inconvenience.
sentences.cn: 所有这一切他都给她增添了麻烦.

sentences.en: Do not inconvenience yourself for my sake.
Does the noise of the TV inconvenience you?
sentences.cn: 电视的嘈杂吵声打扰你 吗 ?

sentences.en: Having to change trains is a small inconvenience.
sentences.cn: 换乘火车多少有些不便.

sentences.en: He declined, fearing to cause her inconvenience.
sentences.cn: 恐怕给她带来不便,于是他谢绝了.

sentences.en: I must have caused you a lot of inconvenience.
sentences.cn: 我一定给你添了不少麻烦吧.

sentences.en: It often causes a lot of inconvenience when buses come late.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车晚点时,常常引起许多不便.

sentences.en: It's no inconvenience to drive you to the station.
sentences.cn: 开车送你去车站一点也不麻烦.

sentences.en: Sorry to have troubled you with all such inconvenience.
That clothing is the inconvenience to her figure.
sentences.cn: 那衣服是不适合她的身材的.

sentences.en: The deep snow made a lot of inconvenience for drivers.
sentences.cn: 雪很深给司机造成很不方便.

sentences.en: We apologise for the delay and any inconvenience caused.
sentences.cn: 我们对延误和由此造成的不便深感抱歉。

sentences.en: We've already been put to great inconvenience.
Whoever suffered inconvenience, she must suffer none.
sentences.cn: 无论让谁承受不便, 也不能让她有所不便.

sentences.en: You will not inconvenience in the least.

trans.tran_cn: 不方便，麻烦，为难之处，麻烦事
trans.tran_en: problems caused by something which annoy or affect you

trans.tran_cn: 给…带来不便，给…添麻烦，打扰，使为难
